repository

Repository repository
the registered repository

repositoryName

String repositoryName
the name of the repository as configured

jndiContext

InitialContext jndiContext
the jndi context, created base on configuration

rmiURI

String rmiURI
The rmi uri, in the form of '//${rmi-host}:${rmi-port}/${repository-name}' This field is only set to a non-null value, if registration of the repository to an RMI registry succeeded in the #registerRMI() method.

See Also:
#registerRMI(), #unregisterRMI()

Class org.apache.jackrabbit.j2ee.SimpleWebdavServlet extends org.apache.jackrabbit.server.AbstractWebdavServlet implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

the resource path prefix

authenticate_header

String authenticate_header
Header value as specified in the INIT_PARAM_AUTHENTICATE_HEADER parameter.

lockManager

org.apache.jackrabbit.webdav.lock.LockManager lockManager
Map used to remember any webdav lock created without being reflected in the underlying repository. This is needed because some clients rely on a successful locking mechanism in order to perform properly (e.g. mac OSX built-in dav client)
